channel.title: Lance Zeeman's Weekend Party Entertainment Report
channel.description: Everything you need to know about the world of entertainment.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Stay in touch with the world of entertainment!
channel.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
channel.itunes:summary: Lance Zeeman gets you ready for the weekend's entertainment.

item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Amazing Grace and The Book of Face | 17 November 2018
item.itunes:subtitle: Lance Zeeman's Weekend Party Entertainment Report.
item.description:
The crime caper Widows is at the movies, Aretha Frankin's gospel concert finally gets a release some 40 years after it was filmed. Cheech and Chong are pushing hemp based grooming products, Facebook are trying to lure back the teens as Spielberg, Winfrey and Jones reunite for another shot at The Color Purple. Your favorite horror character is now ready to 'slash' your Christmas tree.

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty
item.itunes:summary: The crime caper Widows is at the movies, Aretha Frankin's gospel concert finally gets a release some 40 years after it was filmed. Cheech and Chong are pushing hemp based grooming products, Facebook are trying to lure back the teens as Spielberg, Winfrey and Jones reunite for another shot at The Color Purple. Your favorite horror character is now ready to 'slash' your Christmas tree.
item.itunes:keywords: Widows,Viola Davis, Aretha Franklin, Oprah, Spielberg, Facebook,trick or treat,Leatherface,jigsaw,lasso,Sade,Cheech and Chong,The Color Purple, Weekend Party, Entertainment Report, Lance Zeeman, Hot 91.9 FM, Solid Gold Podcasts

item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Spiders, Sequels, Spice Girls and Little Mix | 10 November 2018
item.itunes:subtitle: Lance Zeeman's Weekend Party Entertainment Report.
item.description:
Lance Zeeman presents his 'Weekend Party' Entertainment Report. Everything you should be looking out for in the world of entertainment. In this episode : Computer Hacker Lisbeth Salander is back as Hollywood gets an overdose of sequelitis. Next up is Austin Powers, Gladiator and Shrek. The Spice Girls are back minus Posh, but Little Mix is where Girl Power is at as Duran Duran become socially aware courtesy of David Medina.

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty
item.itunes:summary: Lance Zeeman presents his 'Weekend Party' Entertainment Report. Everything you should be looking out for in the world of entertainment. item.itunes:keywords: Dragon Tattoo, Austin Powers, Gladiator, Shrek, Spice Girls, Girl Power, Little Mix, Joan of Arc, Duran Duran, David Medina, Weekend Party, Entertainment Report, Lance Zeeman, Shane The Duke Wellington, Hot 91.9 FM, Solid Gold Podcasts

item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Do the Neymar as Tyson grows Weed in the Jungle with 50 and Prince! | 3 November 2018
item.itunes:subtitle: Lance Zeeman's Weekend Party Entertainment Report.
item.description:
Lance Zeeman presents his 'Weekend Party' Entertainment Report. Everything you should be looking out for in the world of entertainment. In this episode : Tyler Perry's NOBODY'S FOOL, tech magnate John McAfee's life is getting the movie treatment. Mike Tyson ROLLS WITH THE PUNCHES as he farms weed. PRINCE gets the doccie treatment and 50 Cent resumes his beef with JA RULE as STOP, DROP and ROLL becomes a thing courtesy of NEYMAR.

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty
item.itunes:summary: Lance Zeeman presents his 'Weekend Party' Entertainment Report. Everything you should be looking out for in the world of entertainment. item.itunes:keywords: TIFFINAY HADDISH, WHOOPPIE GOLDBERG, SETH ROGEN, McAFEE, MIKE TYSON, WEED, MARIJUANA, PRINCE, 50, JA RULE NEYMAR, Weekend Party, Entertainment Report, Lance Zeeman, Shane The Duke Wellington, Hot 91.9 FM, another Solid Gold studios podcast

item.itunes:author: Lance Zeeman | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: First Man in Black Samples a Cat on Halloween | 27 October 2018
item.itunes:subtitle: Lance Zeeman's Weekend Party Entertainment Report.
item.description:
Lance Zeeman presents his 'Weekend Party' Entertainment Report. Everything you should be looking out for in the world of entertainment. In this episode :Its a Giant Leap for biopics as Niel Armstrong's journey from a test pilot to astronaut gets the movie treatment in FIRST MAN. The filming on the MIB spin off with Chris Hemsworth has wrapped, will we get to see a Big Willie cameo? Conceptual artist Sophie Calle's cat died so she recorded a 37 track album in dedicated to her late feline friend. Nicki Minaj is being sued for sampling Tracey Chapman with out getting permission, the irony is that the song is called SORRY. It's a very Happy Halloween as Freddy Krueger, Jason Voorhees, Ghostface, Michael Myers and Leatherface spoof the Backstreet Boys with 'I'LL KILL YOU THAT WAY'

Another Solid Gold Podcast SolidGoldStudios.co.za/weekendparty

item.itunes:keywords: Moonlanding, space, sample, cat, permission, copyright, spoof, halloween, sued, Weekend Party, Entertainment Report, Lance Zeeman, Shane The Duke Wellington, Hot 91.9 FM, another Solid Gold Studios podcast, Gavin Kennedy

item.description:
Lance Zeeman presents his 'Weekend Party' Entertainment Report. Everything you should be looking out for in the world of entertainment. In this episode :The Papillon remake is here, Sting & Shaggy's new music video, The Taylor Swift Factor, Melania Trump stripping in The Oval Office and Chow Yun Fat to give away his fortune.
